Supplier.description: Supplier/company name issuing the sourcing declaration (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material/raw material name covered by the sourcing declaration.

MaterialCode.description: Supplier or internal material identifier, if present.

IssueDate.description: Date on which the sourcing form/declaration was issued or signed.

Components.description: Per-component sourcing table listing each INCI and its source category and details.

INCIName.description: INCI name for the component as printed in the sourcing table.

SourceCategory.description: Primary source category exactly as declared: Plant, Mineral, Animal, Animal-Related, Petroleum, or Microorganism.

Details.description: Source detail text (e.g., species, feedstock, extraction type). Capture genus/species when provided.

AnimalDerivedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates any animal-derived materials are used; False if explicitly none.

AnimalRelatedMaterials.description: True if the form indicates animal-related materials (e.g., milk, honey) are used; False if explicitly none.

MineralDerivedMaterials.description: True if any mineral-derived components are declared; otherwise False.

PetroleumDerivedMaterials.description: True if any petroleum-derived components are declared; otherwise False.

MicroorganismDerivedMaterials.description: True if any microorganism-derived components are declared; otherwise False.

ProcessingAids.description: List any processing aids referenced by the form, including whether they contain animal or animal-related materials.

AidName.description: Name/description of the processing aid (e.g., Nitrogen).

ContainsAnimalOrAnimalRelated.description: True if the form answers 'Yes' to processing aids containing animal-derived or animal-related materials for this aid.

ContainsGMO.description: True if the declaration indicates the material contains GMOs; False if marked 'Non-GMO' or 'No'.

CountryOfOrigin.description: Mapping of component INCI to country/region of origin if provided.

INCIName.description: INCI of the component for which origin is stated.

Country.description: Country or region stated as origin (e.g., 'EU', 'Spain', 'EU/Ukraine'). Preserve composite regions as printed.

CountryOfManufacture.description: Country where the blend/material is manufactured (e.g., 'United States').
